item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: The Champions League draw, simulated
item.description: About a year ago, I had a thought that turned into a quick analysis, which I summarized in this tweet: File under "Extremely random analyses": Probabilities (in %) of matchups for Champions League knockout round across 1 million simulations. Draw is in a few hours. Three English teams finishing as runners-up makes the makes the distribution of possibilities a little lopsided. pic.twitter.com/mOV1D6oPLn — Ryan Menezes (@ryanvmenezes) December 17, 2018 As someone who grew up watching a truly absurd amount
